rdf:Description.dc:title: Mathematics preparation 10 2000
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Learning. Learning Technologies Branch.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Basic student resource in Alberta for senior high mathematics, course 10.
Modules: 1. Exploration of numbers -- 2. Number connections -- 3. Patterns and algebra -- 4. Polynomials -- 5. Shape and space.
Approved for use in Alberta schools.
